remarks: The multiplication of two continuous complex functions is continuous. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)
statement:
mulcncf.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> A ) e. ( X -cn-> CC ) ) $.
mulcncf.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> B ) e. ( X -cn-> CC ) ) $.
mulcncf $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> ( A x. B ) ) e. ( X -cn-> CC ) ) $.
$d X x $.
$d ph x $.
